Name: Everless
About the game: Everless is a 2D, top-down, singleplayer, puzzle game where the player plays through pre-built stages with different puzzles. Currently there is only one 'Gamemode' which is a storymode and the game has no save function. What can you do in this game? Move around. Pick up boxes. Move around and pick up boxes... wait is that all you can do? Use your brain... wait but I can already do that in real life... Atleast we have original art and soundtrack... I suppose.
